sentence.Network_en: She gave him a quick sidelong glance.
sentence.Network_cn: 她迅速斜眼瞥了他一眼。

sentence.Network_en: She cast a sidelong glance at Eric to see if he had noticed her blunder.
sentence.Network_cn: 她偷偷斜扫了埃里克一眼，看他有没有留意到她的错误。

sentence.Network_en: She cast a sidelong glance at Fern.

可视报表 in English, translation,... ... 临视 to observe personally 眄视 to give a sidelong glance 睨视 to look askance.
侧的解释 | 侧... ... ◆ 侧面[  side；aspect；flank ] ◆ 侧目[ sidelong glance ] ◆ 侧目而视[  look askance at sb. ].
GARETH coughed , cleared his throat a sidelong glance ., 盖利斯咳嗽了一下 , 清了清喉咙 , 瞥了魔手一眼.
as they filed out , Nina gave Jack a sidelong glance , Tony Almeida couldn't hide his disgust .所有人鱼贯而出，尼娜瞥了杰克一眼，托尼·阿尔梅达无法掩饰脸上的憎恶表情。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: alteration of earlier sideling, from side + the adverbial suffix -ling

entry.tran: 斜着眼看的;侧眼看的;睨视的
entry.def: If you give someone a sidelong look, you look at them out of the corner of your eyes.

example.ex: She gave him a quick sidelong glance.
example.tran: 她迅速斜眼瞥了他一眼。

means.word_mean: 1. (used especially of glances) directed to one side with or as if with doubt or suspicion or envy;

sentences.sentence: "her eyes with their misted askance look"- Elizabeth Bowen

means.word_mean: 2. situated at or extending to the side;
3. inclining or directed to one side;

sentences.sentence: "moved downward in a sidelong way" - Bram Stoker
"the plow lay sidelong on the ground"

means.word_mean: 2. with the side toward someone or something;

sentences.sentence: "seated sidelong to the window"- Nathaniel Hawthorne

means.word_mean: 3. to, toward or at one side;

sentences.sentence: "darting eyes looking sidelong out of a wizened face"

means.word_mean: 横向的;向旁的;间接的;侧面的

sentences.en: She cast a sidelong glance at Fern.
He stole a sidelong glance at the young woman sitting next to him on the train.
sentences.cn: 在火车上他偷偷地瞟了一眼坐在身旁的年轻女子。
